name: Manila
WelcomeMessage: Welcome to Manila! Start your urban challenge.

rewardItems.name: Golden Jeepney
rewardItems.description: A golden miniature of Manila's iconic Jeepney.
rewardItems.endgamefeedback: You have successfully navigated the urban challenges of Manila, demonstrating your commitment to sustainability and innovation. Your efforts have made a positive impact on the city's future, and your leadership will be remembered for generations to come. Congratulations on completing the Manila urban challenge!

rewardItems.name: Silver Coconut
rewardItems.description: A silver coconut symbolizing the Philippines' tropical beauty.
rewardItems.endgamefeedback: You have made significant progress in addressing the urban challenges of Manila, showcasing your dedication to sustainable solutions and community well-being. Your contributions have helped shape a brighter future for the city, and your leadership is commendable. Well done on completing the Manila urban challenge!

rewardItems.name: Bronze Sun Pin
rewardItems.description: A bronze pin representing the sun from the Philippine flag.
rewardItems.endgamefeedback: You have taken important steps towards addressing the urban challenges of Manila, demonstrating your commitment to positive change and urban sustainability. Your efforts have made a difference in the city's future, and your leadership is appreciated. Congratulations on completing the Manila urban challenge!

urbanChallenges.name: Air Pollution in Manilla
urbanChallenges.description: Manila suffers from severe air pollution, with high levels of smog and particulate matter. How will you address this issue?

urbanChallenges.name: Waste Management in Manilla
urbanChallenges.description: Manila faces significant challenges in waste management, with overflowing landfills and limited recycling programs. How will you address this issue?

urbanChallenges.name: Water Pollution in Manilla
urbanChallenges.description: Manila's water sources are heavily polluted, affecting public health and the environment. How will you address this issue?

urbanChallenges.name: Homelessness in Manilla
urbanChallenges.description: Manila faces a growing homelessness crisis, with many people living on the streets. How will you address this issue?
